name: Limited Connection (brandygonz12)
description:
In this game, you transmit message between people. Transmit it before they get annoyed and wait till they finish discussing !

If you interrupt their conversation, they will get upset and you will have some seconds to reconnect them.

You can use a node as often as you want but each edge can only be used once at a time. If you use an already used edge, it will disconnect the current conversation.

Enfoy

- thanks to Toadysword and fuhria_ to make this game with me at Global Game Jam
